Test Description: Artificer discount and Places of Power.
Difficulty Notes: Discount does NOT apply to Places of Power.
Question: Does the Artificer’s discount reduce the cost to claim a Place of Power?
Rationale: Discount only applies to artifacts, not Places of Power.:contentReference[oaicite:16]{index=16}:contentReference[oaicite:17]{index=17}
